name: Helen F. PASTIERIK, Executrix of the Estate of Paul P. Pastierik, Deceased, v. DUQUESNE LIGHT COMPANY, a corporation, Petitioner

parties: Helen F. PASTIERIK, Executrix of the Estate of Paul P. Pastierik, Deceased, v. DUQUESNE LIGHT COMPANY, a corporation, Petitioner.

opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 14 W.D. Appeal Docket 1986.

casebody.head_matter:
505 A.2d 254
Helen F. PASTIERIK, Executrix of the Estate of Paul P. Pastierik, Deceased, v. DUQUESNE LIGHT COMPANY, a corporation, Petitioner.
